name: Openness to experience
definition: Openness reflects the degree of intellectual curiosity, creativity and a preference for novelty and variety a person has. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_Five_personality_traits)

name: Conscientiousness
definition: A tendency to be organized and dependable, show self-discipline, act dutifully, aim for achievement, and prefer planned rather than spontaneous behavior. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_Five_personality_traits)

name: Extraversion
definition: Energy, positive emotions, surgency, assertiveness, sociability and the tendency to seek stimulation in the company of others, and talkativeness. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_Five_personality_traits)

name: Agreeableness
definition: A tendency to be compassionate and cooperative rather than suspicious and antagonistic towards others. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_Five_personality_traits)

name: Neuroticism
definition: The tendency to experience unpleasant emotions easily, such as anger, anxiety, depression, and vulnerability. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_Five_personality_traits)

name: Honesty
definition: Tendency towards sincerity, modesty, fairness, and greed avoidance. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trait_theory#List_of_personality_traits)

name: Self-esteem
definition: A "favorable or unfavorable attitude toward the self" (Rosenberg, 1965). An individual's sense of his or her value or worth, or the extent to which a person values, approves of, appreciates, prizes, or likes him or herself" (Blascovich & Tomaka, 1991) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trait_theory#List_of_personality_traits

name: Harm avoidance
definition: A tendency towards shyness, being fearful and uncertain, tendency to worry. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trait_theory#List_of_personality_traits

name: Novelty seeking
definition: Impulsive, exploratory, fickle, excitable, quick-tempered, and extravagant. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trait_theory#List_of_personality_traits

name: Sensation-seeking
definition: a personality trait defined by the search for experiences and feelings, that are "varied, novel, complex and intense", and by the readiness to "take physical, social, legal, and financial risks for the sake of such experiences." https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sensation_seeking

name: Self-directedness
definition: a personality trait of self-determination, that is, the ability to regulate and adapt behavior to the demands of a situation in order to achieve personally chosen goals and values. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Self-directedness

name: Reward dependence
definition: a tendency to respond markedly to signals of reward, particularly to verbal signals of social approval, social support, and sentiment. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reward_dependence

name: Persistence
definition: perseverance in spite of fatigue or frustration. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Persistence_(psychology)

name: Cooperativeness
definition: the degree to which a person is generally agreeable in their relations with other people as opposed to aggressively self-centred and hostile.  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cooperativeness

name: Self-transcendence
definition: a personality trait associated with experiencing spiritual ideas such as considering oneself an integral part of the universe. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Self-transcendence

name: Impulsiveness
definition: a tendency to act on a whim, displaying behavior characterized by little or no forethought, reflection, or consideration of the consequences. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Impulsivity
